Package MultiMemetic.PopulationHeuristics

Class NextDescentHC

java.lang.Object
MultiMemetic.PopulationHeuristics.PopulationHeuristic
MultiMemetic.PopulationHeuristics.NextDescentHC
Direct Known Subclasses:
NextDescentHC_G, NextDescentHC_GE
public abstract class NextDescentHC extends PopulationHeuristic
Abstract class for nest descent hill climb which is a type of population heuristic.

      public NextDescentHC(Problem problem, Random random)

  • Method Details

    • applyHeuristic

      public void applyHeuristic(int solutionIndex)
      Applies the next descent hill climb heuristic which bit flips each of the bits in the solution sequentially. Delta evaluation is used to speed up computation so that the result is produced more quickly. Only one bit needs to be checked and if the solution is worse after flipping that one bit then it is flipped back.
      Specified by:
      applyHeuristic in class PopulationHeuristic
      Parameters:
      solutionIndex - an int, which is the index of the solution.

    • acceptMove

      public abstract boolean acceptMove(double delta, double threshold)
      Abstract method to check if a move is acceptable.
      Parameters:
      delta - a double, which is change between the old solution and the new solution.
      threshold - a double, which is the threshold the delta is compared to.
      Returns:
      a boolean, to indicate if the move was accepted or not.
